price: Nea εsεsε wobͻ no kͻkͻ ne obi a odi Afutusεm (Qur’aan) no akyi, na osuro Ahummͻborͻ Hene no wͻ kokoa mu. (Nkͻmhyεni), Fa bͻnefakyε ne Animuonyam akatua kεseε no ho bͻhyԑ ma (saa nipa) no.
arabic: إِنَّمَا تُنذِرُ مَنِ ٱتَّبَعَ ٱلذِّكۡرَ وَخَشِيَ ٱلرَّحۡمَٰنَ بِٱلۡغَيۡبِۖ فَبَشِّرۡهُ بِمَغۡفِرَةٖ وَأَجۡرٖ كَرِيمٍ

version.title: Ashanti Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Ashanti by Sheikh Haroun Ismaeel

meta.transliteration: innamā tundhiru mani ittabaʿa al-dhik'ra wakhashiya al-raḥmāna bil-ghaybi fabashir'hu bimaghfiratin wa-ajrin karīmin
